rows.label: tlk70000067_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I've seen knights make that
face. Means a battle's coming
that you can't avoid.

rows.label: tlk70000067_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Shin.. I remember how you put your
own life on the line to save this
village many times 80 years ago.

rows.label: tlk70000067_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Time marches on, the ages pass
from one generation to the
next, but you do not change.

rows.label: tlk70000067_05_msg0005
rows.name: I know this well. I idolized you once.

rows.label: tlk70000067_05_msg0006
rows.name:
My inn isn't much, but whenever
you're weary, know that its
doors are always open to you.
